initial.title: Welcome to ReCycle!
initial.description: ReCycle is an effective solution for waste utilization. It provides outstanding possibilities for utilizing plastic, paper, metal and glass by design. Also we show statistics by your profile and have a bonus program.
initial.footer: We use modern tech approaches to maximize speed of recycling and minimize ecological pollution. Help us to make the world better!

logged.title: Welcome to ReCycle!
logged.description: Here you can choose a kind of waste you want to hand over. Pick desired one, choose the amount of waste needed to utilize and center of utilization. Well done!
